properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW FROM MEMBER WHERE (MEM_STATUS = 'Y' OR MEM_STATUS = 'A') AND MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT RPAD(SUBSTR(MEM_ID,1,3), LENGTH(MEM_ID), '*') AS"SECREAT_ID" , MEM_ID , MEM_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_EMAIL = ?
SELECT MEM_PWD , MEM_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_EMAIL = ?

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , NULL , DEFAULT , ? , '일반' , ? , ? , ? , ? , NULL , NULL )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_STATUS = 'Y' OR M.MEM_STATUS = 'A' ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_STATUS = 'Y' OR M.MEM_STATUS = 'A' ORDER BY MEM_NAME ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_STATUS = 'Y' OR M.MEM_STATUS = 'A' ORDER BY MEM_GRADE ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) as "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE (MEM_STATUS ='Y' OR MEM_STATUS ='A')
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'B' WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_MODIFYDATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW FROM MEMBER M WHERE MEM_ID LIKE %?% OR MEM_NAME LIKE %?% ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_PHONE = ? , MEM_EMAIL = ? , MEM_NICKNAME = ? , MEM_IMGPATH = ? , ADDRESS_CODE = ? , ADDRESS = ? , ADDRESS_DETAIL = ? , ADDRESS_REF = ? , MEM_MODIFYDATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , REM.MEM_NICKNAME , SRM.MEM_ID , SR.REVIEW_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE FROM REPORT RE JOIN MEMBER REM ON (RE.MEM_NO = REM.MEM_NO) JOIN STORE_RE SR ON (RE.RE_NO = SR.RE_NO) JOIN MEMBER SRM ON (SR.REVIEW_WRITER = SRM.MEM_NO) ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' , WITHDRAW = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?

SELECT M.MEM_ID, (SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_WRITER) FROM STORE_RE S WHERE M.MEM_NO = S.REVIEW_WRITER) AS STORE_REVIEW, (SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_WRITER) FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW P WHERE M.MEM_NO = P.REVIEW_WRITER) AS PRODUCT_REVIEW, (SELECT SUM(MPS_RECORD) FROM MPS_POINT MP WHERE M.MEM_NO = MP.MEM_NO) AS MPS_POINT, (SELECT COUNT(MEM_NO) FROM STORE_SCRAP SS WHERE M.MEM_NO = SS.MEM_NO) AS STORE_SCRAP, (SELECT COUNT(F_MNO) FROM FOLLOW F WHERE M.MEM_NO = F.F_MNO) AS FOLLOW FROM MEMBER M WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_ID , MPS_CATEGORY , MPS_RECORD , MPS_STATUS , SU_DATE FROM MPS_POINT JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? ORDER BY SU_DATE DESC )A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT (SELECT STORE_NAME FROM STORE S WHERE SC.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO) AS STORE_NAME, (SELECT STORE_ADDRESS FROM STORE S WHERE SC.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO) AS STORE_ADDRESS, (SELECT AVG(REVIEW_RATE) FROM STORE_RE SR WHERE SR.STORE_NO = SC.STORE_NO) AS RATE FROM STORE_SCRAP SC JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? ORDER BY SCRAP_DATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2
SELECT M.MEM_NO , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_PHONE , SU_DATE , MPS_RECORD , MPS_CATEGORY , MPS_STATUS FROM MPS_POINT MP, MEMBER M WHERE MP.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO ORDER BY SU_DATE DESC

SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, REVIEW_MONTH, SAVE_POINT, MPS_DATE, P_STATUS FROM ( SELECT M.MEM_NO , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_ID , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE_RE WHERE REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEM_NO AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM REVIEW_ENROLLDATE) ) "REVIEW_MONTH" , 5000 "SAVE_POINT" , TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SR.REVIEW_ENROLLDATE, +1), 'mm'),'YYYY-MM-DD') "MPS_DATE" , P_STATUS FROM MPS_POINT MP JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = MP.MEM_NO) JOIN STORE_RE SR ON (M.MEM_NO = SR.REVIEW_WRITER) WHERE MP.P_STATUS = '대기중' AND MPS_STATUS = '적립' )
UPDATE MPS_POINT SET P_STATUS = '지급완료' , MPS_RECORD = 5000 WHERE TOS_NO = ?

SELECT F.FOLLOW_NO , M.MEM_NICKNAME , M.MEM_IMGPATH , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW FF WHERE FF.FING_MNO = F.FING_MNO ) AS FOLLOW , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_WRITER = F.FING_MNO ) AS PRODUCT_REVIEW , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE_RE WHERE REVIEW_WRITER = F.FING_MNO ) AS STORE_REVIEW FROM FOLLOW F JOIN MEMBER M ON(F.FING_MNO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE F_MNO = ?
SELECT SU_DATE , MPS_CATEGORY , MPS_STATUS , MPS_RECORD FROM MPS_POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NICKNAME = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW , MEM_MODIFYDATE-MEM_ENROLLDATE AS"DAY" FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_STATUS = 'B' OR M.MEM_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY MEM_NAME ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW , MEM_MODIFYDATE-MEM_ENROLLDATE AS"DAY" FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_STATUS = 'B' OR M.MEM_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY M.MEM_STATUS ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW , MEM_MODIFYDATE-MEM_ENROLLDATE AS"DAY" FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_STATUS = 'B' OR M.MEM_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY MEM_MODIFYDATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW , MEM_MODIFYDATE-MEM_ENROLLDATE AS"DAY" FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_STATUS = 'B' OR M.MEM_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY DAY ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) as "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE (MEM_STATUS ='N' OR MEM_STATUS ='B')
DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT NVL(SUM(MPS_RECORD), 0) "USEABLE_MPS" FROM MPS_POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT NVL(SUM(MPS_RECORD), 0) "MPS_DELETE" FROM MPS_POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND MPS_STATUS = '적립' AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,SU_DATE) BETWEEN 11 AND 12

(SELECT REVIEW_ENROLLDATE AS RV_DATE , STORE_NAME AS RV_NAME , SR_CATEGORY AS RV_CATEGORY , REVIEW_RATE AS RV_RATE FROM STORE_RE JOIN STORE USING(STORE_NO) WHERE REVIEW_WRITER = ?
UNION
SELECT PR_REVIEW_ENROLLDATE , PRODUCT_NAME , PR_CATEGORY , PR_REVIEW_RATE FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE REVIEW_WRITER = ? ) ORDER BY RV_DATE DESC

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS RV_MONTH FROM (SELECT SR.REVIEW_CONTENT FROM STORE_RE SR JOIN MEMBER M ON (SR.REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEM_NO) WHERE M.MEM_NO = ?
UNION
SELECT PR.PR_REVIEW_CONTENT FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW PR JOIN MEMBER M ON (PR.REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEM_NO) WHERE M.MEM_NO = ?)
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS RV_TOTAL FROM STORE_RE SR JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = SR.REVIEW_WRITER) WHERE REVIEW_WRITER = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_IMGPATH , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_ID , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE_RE WHERE REVIEW_WRITER = MEM_NO ) AS STORE_REVIEW FROM MEMBER M
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_TYPE , MEM_NO , RE_NO , RP_MEM_ID , MEM_NICKNAME_RP ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPNO.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT SCRAP_NO , S.STORE_IMG_PATH , S.STORE_NAME , S.STORE_ADDRESS , S.SCRAP_RATE FROM STORE_SCRAP SS JOIN STORE S ON (S.STORE_NO = SS.STORE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = SS.MEM_NO) WHERE SS.MEM_NO = ?
INSERT INTO STORE_SCRAP ( STORE_NO , MEM_NO , SCRAP_DATE , SCRAP_NO , STORE_IMG ) VALUES ( ? , ? , SYSDATE , SEQ_SSCRAPNO.NEXTVAL , ? )
INSERT INTO FOLLOW ( FOLLOW_NO , F_MNO , FING_MNO , ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FOLNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM REPORT
UPDATE STORE_RE SET REVIEW_STATUE = 'Y'
